column4: I've got the dual screen working .. nvidia-settings is a very nice util. What does seem a bit strange though, is that one of the monitors is very slow loading the graphics .. i.e it seems like there's a delay before the Applications menu pops down... Any idea what might be causing that ?
I don't get sound on i.e youtube whatsoever.
candell, are you missing just the buttons, or the whole line in which they live ?
